text: Adam Jakub Kopczyński (2 August 1948 – 8 February 2021)Zmarł Adam Kopczyński, sportdziennik.com was a Polish ice hockey player. He played for Cracovia and ŁKS Łódź. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1972 Winter Olympics. He died from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland, aged 72.Zmarł Adam Kopczyński ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish ice hockey players Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland
title: Adam Kopczyński
